item.title: Animals & Nature
item.author: beemarkableart@gmail.com (Emilija)
item.description: A vivid journey through the natural world, where life thrives in countless forms and colors. This category celebrates the beauty, mystery, and harmony of all living beings — from the smallest flutter in the air to the grandest expression of the wild. It’s a tribute to nature’s endless creativity and the deep connection we share with it.
